question: Does Accutane stunt growth?
question_content: I'm 15 turning 16 in 8 months.  I'm 5 foot 4 and I heard that accutane will stunt your growth.  Is this true or not because I've been taking it for 2 months.  I take 20mg 1 day

answers.answer_content:
Dude:Accutane will not stunt your growth at all
Your genes rule
Colors

I was on Accutane for about 1 year and it didn't do a thing. Acne was the same and I am 6 foot 2 inches so I'd say it didn't stunt growth either. The only changes were that I couldn't drink alcohol and lost some money.

You're probably better off not taking accutane, unless your face is absolutely covered in spots, and i mean really really really bad.

Because with excercise (like playing football, soccer, basketball), lots of green vegetables, enough water, good sleep everyday, taking a safe multivitamin/mineral, as littel stress as possible, and just washing your face with water your skin will transform in 6 months naturally.
